Literature.Title: Generation of truncated derivatives through in silico enzymatic digest of peptide GV30 target MRSA both in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Ma Y, Yao A, Chen X, Wang L, Ma C, Xi X, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=256 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:<5% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=>512µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=>512µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=>512µM),Enterococcus faecium NTCC 12697(MIC=>512µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1707(MIC=>512µM)
